athena:
Single part electron test 7-80 GeV, larged0 ElectronSlice single particle e 7-80 GeV, larged0 EventMax=6000;runMergedChain=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_ElectronSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_el_sample8.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt-larged0-el.dat -f data-electron-IBL.root -p 11 -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-IBL.root data-el_single_e_7-80_larged0-reference.root HLT_e24_medium_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma HLT_e24_medium_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Electron_EFID HLT_e24_medium_L2Star_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Electron_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-IBL.root data-el_single_e_7-80_larged0-reference.root HLT_e5_loose_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma HLT_e5_loose_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Electron_EFID HLT_e5_loose_L2Star_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Electron_EFID -d HLTEF-plots-lowpt
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-IBL.root data-el_single_e_7-80_larged0-reference.root HLT_e24_medium_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma HLT_e24_medium_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_eGamma_0 HLT_e24_medium_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_eGamma_2 -d HLTL2-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-electron-IBL.root data-el_single_e_7-80_larged0-reference.root HLT_e5_loose_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_eGamma HLT_e5_loose_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_eGamma_0 HLT_e5_loose_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_eGamma_2 -d HLTL2-plots-lowpt
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
data-el_single_e_7-80_larged0-reference.root expert-monitoring-el_single_e_7-80_larged0-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml" TIDAindex-lowpt.html
